titleStmt.title: A word to the army, touching their sin and dutie if it may bee, to convince them of the greatness of the one, and their defectiveness in the other : with a word of advice in the conclusion, humbly tendred to them, in order to their recovery to that path of unfeigned repentance / by William Allen, late Adjutant-general to the Army in Ireland ...
titleStmt.author: Allen, William, Adjutant-general of the army in Ireland.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
